text: GirlsDoPorn was an American pornographic website active between 2009 and 2020. It was based in San Diego, California. It shut down because six people from the site were charged with sex trafficking, fraud, and coercion in November 2019. Two more people were charged with preventing police from stopping sex trafficking in December 2019. The website shut down in January 2020. The United States Department of Justice said that the website and its sister website, GirlsDoToys, had earned over $17 million. ==References== Category:2009 establishments in California Category:2020 disestablishments in the United States Category:Sexual abuse Category:American pornographic websites Category:San Diego
title: GirlsDoPorn
